name: Kill the egg
description:
You play as a farmer who really wants to destroy an egg. Unfortunately, he has a tendency to explode...

Control with the arrow keys/WASD or a controller (only in the download version). Press Space/A to jump.

Software used:
https://unity.com/
https://www.blender.org/
https://www.bfxr.net/
https://www.gimp.org/

All assets are self-created, with the exception of two sounds:
https://opengameart.org/content/synthesized-explosion
https://opengameart.org/content/cracking-sounds
